attributes.title: Worst App I’ve ever downloaded
attributes.review: This app is ABSOLUTE GARBAGE! If there was an app that told robbers where you live, it would be better than this. This TRASH of a person and an app is a sorry excuse to get biased people’s feedback. My pet rock and I hate this app.

attributes.title: I’ve been awake for 3 day’s 😤
attributes.review: There was an old wrinkly orange Cheeto with a yellow puss moth caterpillar on its head🤢. It scared me so much I dropped my phone, I haven’t been able to sleep in days. I would also like to add that creator of this apps a 🤡.

attributes.title: ✨🧚🏼‍♀️💕NOT WORTH YOUR TIME💕🧚🏼‍♀️✨
attributes.review:
This app reminds you how terrible a president Mr. Donald J. Trump is. He is trying to take away the one app that actually allows teens to express themselves all because he is selfish! I don’t want a fugly orange alien running the country I sadly call home. And that’s on PERIODT
🇺🇸MICKEY MOUSE FOR PRESIDENT 2020🇺🇸

attributes.title: g3n-Z
attributes.review: my phone was doing just fine when i didn’t have the app. now that i got it my phone just is so laggy. my pet rock even hates it!!!! disgusting. delete this app off the app store please. so bad.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: Don’t know what I was expecting but this is the worse app I’ve ever downloaded. Have 5 minutes of having it my phone started glitching and my screen turned ORANGE like Cheeto orange..do not download at any cost.

attributes.title: AWFUL
attributes.review: My phone was hacked and I could not get in it for weeks I’m just now able to turn it on and this app will never go in my phone again but TRUMP 2020 on a gravestone

attributes.title: Does not work properly
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it would not open. I am upset that it kept glitching and I cannot stay informed in the field of politics. I’m so upset I’m gonna go cry and drink some coffee.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: My phone glitched like crazy and now it barely works. It downloaded a virus called “racism” and now my phone won’t work properly. This is a poorly constructed app filled with violent, hateful, racist, homophobic, misogynistic, transphobic, xenophobic, content. Profoundly atrocious.

attributes.title: Horrible app pornography everywhere
attributes.review: This app is terrible so many adds and they were all pornography at least give some warning!!!

attributes.title: BUNKER B O Y
attributes.review: He really out here stealing my Cheetos so he can do his makeup. It was my only bag and my last $2 I was so sad that I was crying then he spit in my face and said that’s what you get for wearing a mask. Honestly disappointed because this app caused it all. PLEASE REMOVE FROM THE APPSTORE!
